ARABIC: وَأَرْسَلْنَٰهُ إِلَىٰ مِا۟ئَةِ أَلْفٍ أَوْ يَزِيدُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We sent him to a hundred thousand or even more.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: We sent him to a hundred thousand men or more,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and We sent him forth to a nation of a hundred thousand or more,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We sent him to a hundred thousand or more people.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And We sent him towards a hundred thousand people, in fact more.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And We sent him to a hundred thousand (people) or even more.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And We sent him to a hundred thousand, rather they exceeded.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Then We sent him unto a hundred thousand, or more,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And We sent him to a hundred thousand (folk) or more
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: We sent him as a messenger to a hundred thousand people or more,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And We had sent him to a hundred thousand: rather they exceeded.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: We sent him to a [community of] hundred thousand or more,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And We sent him (on a mission) to a hundred thousand (men) or more.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And We sent him to a hundred thousand (people) or even more.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Then We sent him to a hundred thousand or more,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Then We sent him to a hundred thousand, or more.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And We sent him to [his people of] a hundred thousand or more.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:147] And We sent him, afterwards — as [We had done] before, to a people in Nineveh, in the region of Mosul — to a [community of a] hundred thousand or, in fact, more — [a community of] twenty, thirty or seventy thousand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: And We sent him to a hundred thousand (folk) or more) 20,000 more,
